channel.description: Recent content in The Job Folder on CSI Knowledge Base

item.title: Folder Structure
item.description: Under Construction This page under construction. Subject to change. The Job folder is broken down into the following nested folder structure: # Nested Folder levels Job Folder Billing SOV Invoices Releases Job Documents Contracts - Change Order Insurance Prelim Job Log Dailies Photos Plans - Engineering Estimator - PM Misc Numbers in Real Job Folders In a real job folder, there are numbers in front of each subfolder’s name for easier navigation.
